name: V.D.O
summary:
V.D.O is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 4.
You explore the dreams of Grey and each dream is split into linear sections that the player must complete to progress.

name: VDSC Battle Royal
summary: An Island, a bunch of dragons and guns. Volt Inu's Sailor Club invites you to the greatest battle of your life. Fight 24 other players for Honor, Wealth and Power. Land in strategic locations, loot weapons and supplies to survive the battlegrounds and be the last to be victorious.

name: V de Vinagre
summary: V de Vinagre was a web browser endless runner based on an event during the 2013 protests in Brazil, where more than 60 protesters were arrested in June for carrying vinegar as a home remedy against the tear gas and pepper spray used by police.
